description:
A modified browser built using Electron that helps in responsive web development.


What's Changed
- Added detailed site permissions in the address bar by @meezumi in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1423
- Added New iPhone 17 Versions by @Trishix in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1418
- chore: replace all instances of twitter.com with x.com by @cseas in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1429
New Contributors
- @Trishix made their first contribution in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1418
- @cseas made their first contribution in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1429
- @meezumi made their first contribution in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1423
Full Changelog: https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/compare/v1.17.0...v1.17.1
